snippet.title: Grifford Academy - Official Story Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Meet the cast of characters and get to know more about them in this new Grifford Academy trailer for the upcoming RPG. Grifford Academy is coming to PC, and a demo is available now on Steam. Grifford Academy is a story-rich, coming-of-age RPG set in a mystical book realm where your decisions shape the personalities of the characters. Engage in strategic turn-based combat as you set out to discover the secrets of Caldria.
